description: MCP server to query Data Commons indicators and observations (base or custom).

DC_API_KEY.description: Data Commons API key from apikeys.datacommons.org

DC_TYPE.description: Type of Data Commons to use: base|custom (default: base)

CUSTOM_DC_URL.description: Custom DC base URL when DC_TYPE=custom

DC_ROOT_TOPIC_DCIDS.description: Comma-separated root topic DCIDs for custom DCs

DC_SEARCH_SCOPE.description: Search scope for custom DCs: base_only|custom_only|base_and_custom
